name: @eventuras/web
description: Main web frontend for Eventuras - participant and organizer interface

APPLICATION_URL.description: Public URL where this application is hosted (e.g., http://localhost:3000). Server-side only.

LOGOUT_URL_REDIRECT.description: URL to redirect to after logout. Server-side only.

DEFAULT_LOCALE.description: Default locale for internationalization (e.g., en-US, nb-NO)

AUTH0_DOMAIN.description: Auth0 domain for authentication (e.g., eventuras.eu.auth0.com). Server-side only – used by server-side PKCE flow.

ORGANIZATION_ID.description: The unique organization ID used to scope API calls. Server-side only – passed as prop to client components.

SITE_SETTINGS_URL.description: Base URL for fetching public site settings and branding configuration. Server-side only.

BACKEND_URL.description: Backend API base URL. Server-side only – passed as prop to client components that need it.

AUTH0_CLIENT_ID.description: Auth0 client identifier used by the backend authentication flow (server-side only)

AUTH0_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Auth0 client secret for server-side authentication (never expose to client)

AUTH0_API_AUDIENCE.description: Auth0 API audience identifier for token validation

SESSION_SECRET.description: Secret key for session encryption (must be a strong random string)
